title: Hug Day romantic interactive slideshow (dreamy pastel blue)

requirements.summary: Build a single-page responsive Hug Day slideshow with soft transitions and a cohesive dreamy pastel blue theme.
acceptanceCriteria: The app renders a slideshow view with at least 2 slides and a visible transition (fade or slide) when navigating.
Layout adapts for mobile screens (no horizontal overflow; text and controls remain readable and tappable).
Color palette and styling consistently reflect light blue/pastel romantic theme.

file_operations.description: Create the single-page app shell that renders the Hug Day slideshow as the primary view (no additional routes), applying the dreamy pastel blue layout framing and ensuring mobile-first responsiveness.

Implement the main single-page slideshow view with at least 2 slides, including a soft fade/slide transition between slides and responsive layout constraints (avoid horizontal overflow, keep controls readable/tappable).
Create a reusable slideshow container component that handles slide rendering, active slide state, and transition orchestration (fade or slide) for a soft romantic feel.
Add global theme styling for a dreamy romantic light-blue/pastel palette (background gradients, typography defaults, safe-area padding, and responsive text sizing).
Extend Tailwind theme with project-specific pastel blue/pink tokens and custom keyframes/animations needed for slideshow transitions and ambient effects.

requirements.summary: Implement the main scene slide with the specified hugging couple artwork and exact headline/note text with elegant romantic typography.
acceptanceCriteria: The slide shows the specified headline text “HAPPY HUG DAY” above the couple and the exact bottom note text.
Typography for the headline is visually distinct (elegant/romantic) and larger than other text.
Scene artwork clearly includes blue flowers and the described couple styling (hair colors and clothing colors).

file_operations.description: Create the main scene slide using the static generated artwork (background/scene) and overlay the exact texts: headline “HAPPY HUG DAY” (large elegant romantic styling) and bottom note “Cant hug u physically right now so sending u the virtual ones”, positioned for readability across breakpoints.
Add an elegant romantic display font (e.g., via a web font link) to support the distinctive headline typography, while keeping body text readable on mobile.
Add the generated static scene image asset exactly as specified, for direct frontend use (no backend delivery).

requirements.summary: Add accessible interactive slideshow controls (Next/Previous) with keyboard support and consistent end behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: Next and Previous buttons navigate between slides on click/tap.
Controls are usable on mobile (minimum comfortable tap size) and on desktop (keyboard operable).
Navigation behavior at first/last slide is consistent (either wrap-around or disables appropriately).

file_operations.description: Implement Next/Previous controls with accessible labels (aria-label), comfortable tap targets, and consistent wrap-around or disabled-at-ends behavior (choose one and apply consistently).
Add a small hook to encapsulate slideshow navigation rules (next/prev, wrap/disable decision) and keyboard handlers (Left/Right arrows; Tab + Enter supported by native buttons).
Wire the controls and keyboard support into the slideshow container, ensuring focus states are visible and that navigation remains responsive during transitions.

requirements.summary: Animate headline and bottom note with smooth fade-in when a slide becomes active, synchronized with slide transitions.
acceptanceCriteria: When a slide becomes active, its headline and note fade in smoothly (no sudden pop-in).
Text animation does not block navigation (buttons remain responsive during animation).

file_operations.description: Create a text overlay component for headline/note that applies a smooth fade-in (and optional slight upward drift) on activation, without capturing pointer events that would interfere with navigation.
Add CSS (or Tailwind utility usage) for text fade-in keyframes and timing tuned to match the slide transition duration for a soft romantic feel.
Use the shared text overlay animation for the “HAPPY HUG DAY” headline and bottom note so they fade in smoothly when the slide becomes active.

requirements.summary: Add ambient romantic effects: floating hearts, soft glow, and gentle petal/flower background motion without obstructing text readability.
acceptanceCriteria: Hearts float upward (or drift) continuously with a soft, lightweight animation.
Background includes subtle glow and petal/flower motion elements.
Effects maintain legibility: headline and note remain clearly readable on top of the scene.

file_operations.description: Implement ambient overlay effects: multiple floating heart particles and drifting petal/flower particles, plus a subtle glow layer, with z-index/opacity tuned to preserve readability of headline and note.
Add keyframes for floating/drifting particle motion and glow pulsing; ensure animations are lightweight (transform/opacity) and respect reduced-motion preferences.
Add the generated heart particle sprite exactly as specified for floating overlay animation.
Add the generated petal/flower particle sprite exactly as specified for gentle drifting background animation.
Wire the AmbientRomanceEffects overlay into the slideshow page behind text overlays/controls (or positioned to avoid blocking) and ensure it scales appropriately on mobile.

requirements.summary: Add optional romantic instrumental background music with a visible play/pause toggle that requires user interaction to start.
acceptanceCriteria: A music toggle control is visible and works (play/pause).
Music does not start automatically until the user interacts (e.g., presses play).
Music state (playing/paused) is reflected in the UI.

file_operations.description: Implement a visible play/pause toggle that controls an HTMLAudioElement; ensure playback only starts after explicit user interaction and that UI state reflects playing/paused.
Place and wire the MusicToggle control within the slideshow page UI (non-intrusive placement; accessible label; mobile-friendly tap size).
Add a local romantic instrumental audio file to be used by the music toggle (static frontend asset; no streaming integrations).

requirements.summary: Add required generated static images under frontend/public/assets/generated and wire them into the slideshow and effects (frontend-only).
acceptanceCriteria: All required generated images exist in frontend/public/assets/generated.
The slideshow uses these static assets directly from the frontend build output.
No backend endpoints are used for image delivery.

file_operations.description: Ensure the generated scene image exists at the exact required path/name and is used directly as a static frontend asset.
Ensure the generated heart particle image exists at the exact required path/name and is used directly by the floating hearts effect.
Ensure the generated petal particle image exists at the exact required path/name and is used directly by the drifting petal/flower effect.
Wire the static generated scene asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/hug-day-scene.dim_1920x1080.png into the slide’s artwork rendering (no backend image delivery).

Wire the static generated particle assets at frontend/public/assets/generated/heart-particle.dim_128x128.png and frontend/public/assets/generated/petal-particle.dim_128x128.png into the ambient animation layers (no backend image delivery).
